identity.name: CabLib
identity.description: A premium marketplace connecting medical professionals with health structures. Combines the efficiency of real estate platforms with the trust and hygiene of the medical sector.

usage.headings: Use Manrope for all headings. Keep them dark and tight (tracking-tight).
usage.body: Use DM Sans for all paragraphs. Prioritize readability with relaxed leading.

primary.description: Deep Emerald Green - Used for Primary Actions, Brand headers.

secondary.description: Sage Green - Used for background accents, badges, light highlights.

accent.description: Terracotta - Used for 'Book', 'Contact', or Urgent Actions.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-medium transition-all duration-300 shadow-lg shadow-primary/20
buttons.secondary: bg-white border border-border text-foreground hover:bg-secondary/50 rounded-full px-6 py-3 font-medium transition-all duration-300
buttons.accent: bg-accent text-accent-foreground hover:bg-accent/90 rounded-full px-8 py-3 shadow-md

cards.listing: bg-white rounded-2xl border border-border/50 shadow-sm hover:shadow-xl hover:shadow-emerald-900/5 transition-all duration-300 overflow-hidden group
cards.feature: bg-stone-50/50 rounded-3xl p-8 border border-white/50 backdrop-blur-sm

inputs.search_bar: h-14 md:h-16 pl-6 pr-4 rounded-full border-2 border-transparent bg-white shadow-[0_4px_20px_rgba(0,0,0,0.04)] focus:border-primary/20 focus:ring-4 focus:ring-primary/5 transition-all font-medium text-lg placeholder:text-muted-foreground/50
inputs.filter_select: h-10 rounded-full bg-white border border-border px-4 text-sm font-medium hover:border-primary/50 transition-colors

navigation.header: fixed top-0 w-full z-50 bg-white/80 backdrop-blur-xl border-b border-stone-200/50 h-20 flex items-center

images.style: High-quality, naturally lit, diverse medical professionals, clean modern interiors. No generic stock 'handshakes'.

instructions_to_main_agent: IMPLEMENTATION: Use Shadcn UI for all complex interactions (Select, Dialog, DatePicker) but styled with the 'cards.listing' or 'inputs.search_bar' classes defined above.
LAYOUT: The Search Results page must use the 'split_view' grid. Left side: Scrollable list of cards. Right side: Sticky Map container.
AUTH: The Sign Up flow must include a step for 'RPPS Validation' (11 digits). Use a visual progress bar.
DASHBOARD: Do not make it boring. Use 'cards.feature' style for stats widgets. Use emerald-900 for the sidebar to create contrast.
THEME: FORCE LIGHT MODE. Do not implement dark mode for this iteration. Medical apps need light/clean aesthetics.
CONTENT: All placeholder text must be medical-specific (e.g., 'Cabinet de kinésithérapie', 'Maison de santé Paris 12', 'Dr. Sophie Martin').
universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for dark colors.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Prioritize using pre-existing components from src/components/ui.
